# useConnectionState

The `useConnectionState` hook allows you to simply implement your own `ConnectionState` component.

## Import

```typescript
import { useConnectionState } from "@livekit/components-react";
```

## Usage

```tsx
const connectionState = useConnectionState(room);
```
